statements: SELECT * FROM MusicTheoryExercises WHERE difficulty_level = 'Beginner';
SELECT exercise_id, exercise_topic FROM MusicTheoryExercises WHERE exercise_topic LIKE 'Scales%';
SELECT question, correct_answer FROM MusicTheoryExercises WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY exercise_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MusicTheoryExercises WHERE explanation IS NOT NULL;
SELECT exercise_topic, difficulty_level FROM MusicTheoryExercises WHERE difficulty_level = 'Advanced';
SELECT * FROM MusicTheoryExercises WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY exercise_topic DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT exercise_topic, difficulty_level, question FROM MusicTheoryExercises WHERE exercise_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY exercise_id ASC
SELECT exercise_topic, correct_answer, explanation FROM MusicTheoryExercises WHERE exercise_topic LIKE '%Chords%' OR exercise_topic LIKE '%Scales%' ORDER BY difficulty_level ASC
SELECT DISTINCT difficulty_level FROM MusicTheoryExercises ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT exercise_topic, question, correct_answer, explanation FROM MusicTheoryExercises WHERE difficulty_level = 'Advanced' ORDER BY exercise_topic ASC
SELECT * FROM exercises;
SELECT exercise_title, exercise_description FROM exercises WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM quizzes ORDER BY total_questions DESC;
SELECT exercise_title, difficulty_level FROM exercises WHERE exercise_id = '12345-67890-ABCDE';
SELECT quiz_title FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_description LIKE '%test%';
SELECT * FROM exercises WHERE difficulty_level = 3;
SELECT exercise_title, exercise_description FROM exercises WHERE exercise_id = '1';
SELECT * FROM exercises WHERE difficulty_level > 2 ORDER BY exercise_title DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT difficulty_level FROM exercises ORDER BY difficulty_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE total_questions >= 10 ORDER BY quiz_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_exercises;
SELECT exercise_title, exercise_content FROM music_exercises WHERE difficulty_level > 2;
SELECT exercise_id, exercise_title FROM music_exercises ORDER BY exercise_id DESC;
SELECT quiz_title, time_limit FROM music_quizzes WHERE time_limit < 60;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, completion_status FROM student_progress WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT * FROM music_exercises WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT exercise_title, exercise_content FROM music_exercises WHERE exercise_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT exercise_title, difficulty_level FROM music_exercises ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT quiz_title, time_limit FROM music_quizzes WHERE time_limit < 60;
SELECT * FROM exercises;
SELECT exercise_id, exercise_name FROM exercises WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT quiz_name, total_marks FROM quizzes WHERE total_marks BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT student_id, score FROM student_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE completed = true;
SELECT * FROM exercises;
SELECT exercise_name, difficulty_level FROM exercises ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT quiz_name, total_marks FROM quizzes WHERE total_marks > 50;
SELECT student_id, score FROM student_scores WHERE score BETWEEN 80 AND 100;
SELECT student_id, exercise_name, completed FROM student_progress WHERE completed = TRUE ORDER BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM quizzes
SELECT quiz_title, total_questions FROM quizzes
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM questions
SELECT exercise_title, exercise_description FROM exercises
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM student_progress
SELECT * FROM exercises WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT quiz_title, total_questions FROM quizzes WHERE total_questions < 20 ORDER BY quiz_title DESC;
SELECT exercises.exercise_title, student_progress.score FROM exercises JOIN student_progress ON exercises.exercise_id = student_progress.quiz_id WHERE student_progress.score > 80;

SELECT answers.answer_text, questions.question_text, quizzes.quiz_title FROM answers INNER JOIN questions ON answers.question_id = questions.question_id INNER JOIN quizzes ON questions.quiz_id = quizzes.quiz_id;
SELECT exercise_title, exercise_description, difficulty_level FROM exercises WHERE difficulty_level < 3 OR exercise_title LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY exercise_title ASC;
